Package org.apache.lenya.cms.ac.usecases

Class Summary
AccessControl Usecase to display the AccessControl tab in the site area for a document.
AccessControlUsecase Super class for access-control related usecases.
AddGroup Usecase to add a group.
AddIPRange Usecase to add an IP range.
AddUser Usecase to add a user.
CredentialWrapper Wrapper class for credentials.
DeleteGroup Usecase to delete a group.
DeleteIPRange Delete an IP range.
DeleteUser Usecase to delete a user.
Group Display group information.
GroupMembers Usecase to change the members of a group.
GroupProfile Usecase to change the profile of a group.
Groups Manage groups.
IPRange Show information about an IP range.
IPRangeGroups Usecase to edit a IP range's group affiliation.
IPRangeProfile Usecase to change the profile of an IP range.
IPRangeProfile.Part IP address part holder.
IPRanges Manage IP ranges.
Login Usecase to login a user.
Logout Usecase to log a user out.
User Display user information.
UserGroups Usecase to edit a user's group affiliation.
UserPassword Usecase to change a user's password.
UserProfile Usecase to edit a user's profile.
Users Manage users.
